name: Love waifu #20 - In the White Void
description: Alone in a colorless space, she clutches her hands between her thighs, trembling. Her oversized hoodie slips low, covering just enough. Purple eyes look up — frightened, yes, but open. There’s vulnerability in her stillness, an intimacy in how she waits — as if you're the only one who can pull her from that empty place.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
